content: {"name": "The Gray House Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Special Distribution for Senior Citizens (55+) and Veterans: Second Friday of every month from 2:00pm\u20133:30pm", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "22 Sheldon Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Memorial Square", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "01107", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.1149238, "longitude": -72.6071157}, "phones": [{"number": "(413) 734-6696", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "22:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "20:30", "closes_at": "22:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "20:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Provide prepacked bags or boxes of food"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}]}
